description: You can make this hearty Moroccan-style beef stew as a one-pot oven meal. Serve with rice, pasta or a veggie mash.
name: Moroccan Beef Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Then chuck in all other ingredients, give it a good stir. Pop the lid on and wait. I cooked first 2 hours on the high setting, then switched back to low for the remainder of cook. The colour will change towards end of cook, after all flavours have blended together. Taste as you go and add more seasoning if needed. I added a couple of teaspoons of sugar and more pepper at the end. But go by yours and your families tastes.
